attributes.action: Adjust UK Visa ThresholdAligning with Economic Realities and the Minimum Wage.
attributes.additional_details: So many families are going to be heartbroken
attributes.background: Adjust this outrageous threshold. So many families are going to seperated and left heartbroken. We should not allow our government to put a price on love.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel increase to minimum income requirement for Skilled Worker and Family visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652619

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
